bahaCode:
[div][table width=98% cellspacing=1 cellpadding=1 align=center]
[tr]
[td height=50 width=50 bgcolor=transparent rowspan=4][img=$url_logo$ height=120 width=120][/td]
[td colspan=3 rowspan=2 bgcolor=$color_primary$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=4][b]$title$[/b][/size][/color][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td colspan=2 align=center][size=4][color=$color_level$][b]LV.$level$[/b][/color][/size][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td width=60 bgcolor=transparent colspan=3 align=center][b][color=$color_name$][size=4]$name$[/size][/color][/b][/td]
[td width=70 colspan=2 bgcolor=transparent align=center]$section_right$[/td]
[/tr]
[/table][/div][div]
[/div][div][table width=98% align=center cellspacing=1 cellpadding=1]
[tr]
[td width=90 bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_gender$[/size][/color][/td]
[td width=180 bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$gender$[/size][/color][/td]
[td width=90 bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_age$[/size][/color][/td]
[td width=180 bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$age$[/size][/color][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_race$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$race$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_home$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$home$[/size][/color][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_birthday$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$birthday$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_territory$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center]$territory$[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_size$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$size$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_alignment$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$alignment$[/size][/color][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_bwh$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$bwh$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_light$ align=center][color=$color_dark$][size=3]$system_characteristic$[/size][/color][/td]
[td bgcolor=$color_dark$ align=center][color=$color_light$][size=2]$characteristic$[/size][/color][/td]
[/tr]
[/table][/div]
